channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You Can See The Wildfire Smoke, But Is It Harming Your Health?
item.description: Wildfire smoke harms human health and is reversing progress made through the Clean Air Act.

item.title: See The Six-Planet Parade On Wednesday In Best View Until 2039
item.description: From Aug. 17-21, a spectacular “planet parade” (also called an alignment) features the moon and six planets. Here’s when and where to look on Wednesda...

item.title: General Motors’ Cadillac Gears Up For Its Formula One Debut In 2026
item.description: Detroit-based General Motors Co. is gearing up for its 2026 Formula One debut. GM will be the 11th F1 team.

item.title: Looming October CMMC Deadline Is America’s Y2K Moment

item.title: LG ThinQ ON Heading For Europe: IFA 2025 Demo Teased
item.description: LG's home appliance smart home solution set for IFA showcase.
